name: v1.7.5
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_oci", version = "1.7.5")
# For testing, we also recommend https://registry.bazel.build/modules/container_structure_test

oci = use_extension("@rules_oci//oci:extensions.bzl", "oci")

# Declare external images you need to pull, for example: 
oci.pull(
    name = "distroless_base",
    # 'latest' is not reproducible, but it's convenient.
    # During the build we print a WARNING message that includes recommended 'digest' and 'platforms'
    # values which you can use here in place of 'tag' to pin for reproducibility.
    tag = "latest",
    image = "gcr.io/distroless/base",
    platforms = ["linux/amd64"],
)

# For each oci.pull call, repeat the "name" here to expose them as dependencies.
use_repo(oci, "distroless_base")
```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "56d5499025d67a6b86b2e6ebae5232c72104ae682b5a21287770bd3bf0661abf",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-1.7.5",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v1.7.5/rules_oci-v1.7.5.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)

# You can pull your base images using oci_pull like this:
load("@rules_oci//oci:pull.bzl", "oci_pull")

oci_pull(
    name = "distroless_base",
    digest = "sha256:ccaef5ee2f1850270d453fdf700a5392534f8d1a8ca2acda391fbb6a06b81c86",
    image = "gcr.io/distroless/base",
    platforms = [
        "linux/amd64",
        "linux/arm64",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
* image: allow .tar.zst extension on layer tar by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/523
* chore: remove examples/ from published artifact by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/524
* chore: remove dead code due to duplication by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/522
* Support inheriting environment variable that's value contains = by @sfc-gh-mhazy in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/526
* Revert "feat: use link instead of copy for blobs in oci_image_index" by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/525
* Revert "image: allow .tar.zst extension on layer tar" by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/532
* Add cosign v2.2.3 by @loosebazooka in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/536

## New Contributors
* @sfc-gh-mhazy made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/526
* @loosebazooka made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/536

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v1.7.4...v1.7.5

name: v1.5.0
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_oci", version = "1.5.0")
# For testing, we also recommend https://registry.bazel.build/modules/container_structure_test

oci = use_extension("@rules_oci//oci:extensions.bzl", "oci")

# Declare external images you need to pull, for example: 
oci.pull(
    name = "distroless_base",
    # 'latest' is not reproducible, but it's convenient.
    # During the build we print a WARNING message that includes recommended 'digest' and 'platforms'
    # values which you can use here in place of 'tag' to pin for reproducibility.
    tag = "latest",
    image = "gcr.io/distroless/base",

)

# For each oci.pull call, repeat the "name" here to expose them as dependencies.
use_repo(oci, "distroless_base")

## What's Changed
* Update release.yml by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/296
* fix: oci_tarball should support more than 2 repo_tags by @sfc-gh-ptabor in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/300
* feat(windows): introduce batch wrapper by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/305
* fix(windows): account for \r\n line endings by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/304

* fix(windows): prevent path transformation of arguments to crane mutate by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/306
* Ignore empty repo-tags in the file. Allow \n at the end of files. by @sfc-gh-ptabor in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/312
* fix: restrict oci_image#tar attribute to .tar files by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/313

* Allow to supply env to oci_image as a file (e.g. stamped). by @sfc-gh-ptabor in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/264

* Replace --fail-with-body for a test that checks the status code by @jamiees2 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/276
* Fix: Error: key "type" not found in dictionary by @prestonvanloon in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/291
* Remove '"' from path in MANIFEST_DIGEST when creating a tar file by @rbielak in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/278

body:
📰 This release is the first to offer a semver-stability guarantee, since we've graduated from a 0.x version.

There will be bug-fixes leading up to the final 1.0.0 release, but no breaking changes or new features.

WORKSPACE snippet:

    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v1.0.0-rc0/rules_oci-v1.0.0-rc0.tar.gz",
)

)
```

* fix: auth_config_locator incorrectly reports presence by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/150

* support pulling from ghcr.io by @LavaToaster in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/153
* Update README.md by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/159
* fix: transition a test to explicit arch by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/161
* refactor: oci_pull's in separate macro by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/162
* fix: remove unused toolchain_name attribute by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/164
* syntax sugar for oci_pull by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/163
* fix: fallback to curl on manifest fetch error by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/166
* test(oci_pull): add unit tests for parsing image string by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/167
* fix: remove genrule fetching base image by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/165
* refactor: merge repository into repotags by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/169
* ci: retry auth tests by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/175
